channel.title: Unlimited run energy (Delta)
channel.description: I was hoping someone could tell me how to add unlimited run... i would really appreciate it the players are asking for it and i really don't know where to start. if i release my source i will give creds to whom helps me out in the aspect. please help me witht he unlimited run problem. thanks yours truely ~Blood maniet~

item.title: Unlimited run energy (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:2, topic:362599”]Player class

if (playerEnergy > 0) { playerEnergy -= 1; }

I would imagine you can figure out how to make it not subtract energy ;)[/quote]

not really

Read full topic
